titles.title: Foreign Medical School Accountability Fairness Act of 2026
Foreign Medical School Accountability Fairness Act of 2026
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish fair and consistent eligibility requirements for graduate medical schools operating outside the United States and Canada.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
